title: Purple Axiom environment noise profile snapshot (inputs/environment_noise_profile.json)
description: Contract schema for the resolved environment noise profile snapshot stored under inputs/environment_noise_profile.json when controlled benign noise is enabled.

contract_version.description: Contract version constant for this environment noise profile snapshot.

profile_id.description: Stable identifier for the noise profile (matches runner.environment_config.noise_profile.profile_id).

seed.description: Deterministic seed used for any stochastic elements (matches runner.environment_config.noise_profile.seed; default 0).

targets.description: Optional allowlist of lab asset ids eligible for noise generation (subset of runner.environment_config.targets).

$comment: NOTE: This snapshot is intended to be deterministically hashable. The SHA-256 recorded in manifest.extensions.runner.environment_noise_profile.profile_sha256 is expected to equal sha256(canonical_json_bytes(this_document)) (RFC 8785 / JCS), so this schema intentionally does NOT include a self-referential profile_sha256 field.
